Title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: At the U.S. Dept. of Energy an unexplained event occurs. Then when a young Dungeons and Dragons playing boy named Will disappears after a night with his friends, his mother Joyce and the town of Hawkins are plunged into darkness.
